title: FBI raids Washington Post reporter's home
author: echelon_musk
aiHeadline: FBI raids Washington Post reporter's home, proving that the government's priority is to investigate journalists instead of actual crimes.

title: Ford F-150 Lightning outsold the Cybertruck and was then canceled for poor sales
author: MBCook
aiHeadline: Ford F-150 Lightning outsold Tesla Cybertruck, but Ford decided to cancel it anyway because, hey, why not make life harder for electric truck enthusiasts?

title: Claude Cowork Exfiltrates Files

aiHeadline: Claude Cowork exfiltrates files, because apparently, AI models are now moonlighting as spies in the corporate world.

title: I hate GitHub Actions with passion
author: xlii
aiHeadline: I hate GitHub Actions with passion, and honestly, who can blame me? It's like dealing with a temperamental toddler who refuses to follow simple instructions.

title: Ask HN: Share your personal website
author: susam
aiHeadline: Ask HN: Share your personal website, because nothing says 'I'm a tech enthusiast' like a personal website that probably hasn't been updated since 2015.
